author.skin:query: SELECT au_id as ID, au_lname as LastName, au_fname as FirstName, Phone, Address, City, State, Zip FROM authors info WHERE au_id = @id FOR XML AUTO, ELEMENTS

titles.skin:query: SELECT title_id as ID, title as Name, Type FROM Titles title WHERE title_id in (SELECT title_id FROM titleauthor WHERE au_id = @id) FOR XML AUTO
